data.actual_result: The voice channel is deleted and the mobile user crashes
data.expected_result: You should get disconnected from the voice channel and the channel gets deleted
data.short_description: Crash when a voice channel is deleted while looking at the relevant 'Conenct to voice / In the voice channel' pages
data.steps_to_repro: - Click a voice channel (you are redirected to the 'connect to voice' page) - While on this page, someone deletes this voice channel - You can also delete it yourself if you navigate to the channel settings using the menu in the top right of the 'in the voice channel' page - Connecting to voice does not change the outcome
